div:
Command rngvalidate
Name
rngconvert converts to and from rng, xsd, and dtd schema formats
Synopsis
rngconvert [options] inputfile outputfile
Description
Converts between rng, dtd and xsd schema files.
Uses the TRANG rng conversion code.
Note that trang does not support converting from xsd to rng.
Options
-i input option
-o ouput option
-I input type
-O output type
-C Adds a catalog URI
For details on options see the TRANG manual Trang Manual
CommandXvalidate
